      • update

        public void update(org.newdawn.slick.Input input,
                   float delta)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        pass the input and delta values to all sprites to use as necessary to update their position and action in the game, also update the sprite list where it has been requested a sprite is removed or added
        Parameters:
        input - keyboard input as specified in the slick library
        delta - the number of miliseconds since last call
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
